review: The doctor gives enough time to the patient to understand the problems and prescribes medication accordingly.He doesn't hurry up and is calm.I was very much satisfied.I have visited the doctor twice

Impressed with doctor and my consultation with Dr.Vijay vardhan.however there was not enough controls and disipline followed by support staff..chaos and confusion in organising the patients at front desk.

** ****** **** ****** ********** *** *** **** ***** *** ******* ********** He asked to come after 3 days with multiple test results (only to rule out) even when body temperature was reaching 102.9. I consulted another doctor *** ********** ********** *** ****

the doctor given enough time to patient to understand the problem & prescribe medication .he doesn't Harry up and he clam . i was very much happy & recover soon for his guidelines and medication,  doctor is very much experienced & good .
